products.title: Metropolitan Vanilla Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: If it's a soft colourway you want with a hard-wearing blind, then this metropolitan vanilla wooden blind is a perfect choice. The solid timber slats are painted in this sweet neutral shade, finished so smooth and sleek, with a lovely matt look.
